entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late this evening then increasing to 70 gusting to 90. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
